column1: The Pit Room////If you're going all out on barbecue
column2: you have to try the beef rib here. It's juicy
column4: and delicious. It's like the best brisket you've ever had because it's a barbecued beef rib. Of course
column5: if you aren't ready to shell out over twenty bucks for a whole beef rib
column8: with a peppery rub. The sides are great
column9: and I really like the coleslaw and the corn. The sausage I'm less of a fan of
column11: but a somewhat dry texture. The pork ribs seemed a bit more average
column12: but I do want to try the pulled pork the next time I drop by.
